attributes.name: Beginner 1 (Pre-Alpha) - Thursday 5:15pm
attributes.description:
NOTE: Please read the description for your registered class time.
Class Time: 5:15pm - 5:45pm
Practice/Free time: 5:45pm - 6:15pm

Beginner 1/Pre-Alpha beginning level skating class for ages 6-17

Class curriculum:

  1. Two-foot glide
  2. One-foot glide/ right foot/ left foot
  3. Forward Swizzle
  4. Backward Wiggle
  5. Backward Swizzle
  6. Forward Pumps
  1.  

There are no refunds, make ups or credits for missed classes.
